abstract: Analysts at Goldman Sachs said they expect additional write-downs of about $1 billion to $12 billion each for several major United States brokers in the first quarter, with Citigroup forecast to record the highest write-down of about $12 billion.
lead_paragraph: Analysts at Goldman Sachs said they expect additional write-downs of about $1 billion to $12 billion each for several major United States brokers in the first quarter, with Citigroup forecast to record the highest write-down of about $12 billion.

headline.main: Analysts See More Pain for Citi
